channel.title: Level Restrictions

item.title: Level Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @sigex sigex
item.description:
@sigex wrote:

wrong place then… 100% error is the most common and anoying bug ever and you mite want to make it a bit more advanced so because can see what there cb has to be… in a better detail

public void lowPortal(){
	if(combatLevel < 9){
		sendMssage("You need a combat level greater than 9 to use this portal.");
	} else if(combatLevel > 30){
		sendMessage("Your combat is to advanced to use this portal.");
	} else if (combatLevel > 9 && combatLevel < 30){
		sendMessage("You step in to the portal... and are teleported to the pking area.");
	}
}

ant tested posible bug’s…

Read full topic

Ah Well, I’ll Keep It That Way.

item.title: Level Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

public void lowPortal(){
if(combatLevel > 9 && combatLevel < 30){
teleportToX = 3117;
teleportToY = 9842;
sendMessage(“You Teleport To The 10-29 Pk Area!”);
}
}

And have an npc say low lvl pk zone lol

item.title: Level Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

100 Errors…

EDIT:

public void lowPortal(){ if(combatLevel > 9 && (combatLevel < 30)){ teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("You Teleport To The 10-29 Pk Area!"); } else { sendMessage("This Is The 10-29 Pk Area!"); } }

Should I Put That Just Above My Portal Case? Or Is There Another Location For It…?

Read full topic

public void lowPortal(){
if(combatLevel > 9 && combatLevel < 30){
teleportToX = 3117;
teleportToY = 9842;
sendMessage(“You Teleport To The 10-29 Pk Area!”);
} else
sendMessage(“this is only for 10-29 combat lvls”);
}
}

item.title: Level Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok, Earlier I Had A Problem With Adding A Level Restriction To A Portal… I Got Some Help And Almost Had It Working…

public void lowPortal(){ if(combatLevel > 9 && (combatLevel < 30)){ teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("You Teleport To The 10-29 Pk Area!"); } else { sendMessage("This Is The 10-29 Pk Area!"); } }

//Portals case 7319: // Low Level Pk Portal lowPortal(); break;

Those Are The Two Seperate Codes I Have…
I Get One Error “Illegal Start Of Phrase” Aimed At The ‘public void’

So, Any Help Would Be Apprecated…

Read full topic
